mapper.insert: insert into ea_notice (EN_NUM, EN_ADMIN, EN_SUB, EN_CONT, EN_HIT, EN_FILE, EN_ORIGINAL, EN_DATE) values (ea_notice_seq.nextval, #{en_admin}, #{en_sub}, #{en_cont}, 0, #{en_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{en_original, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, EN_NUM, EN_ADMIN, en_sub, en_cont, en_hit, en_file, en_original, substr(en_date, 1, 11) as en_date from (select * from EA_NOTICE order by en_num desc)) where rnum >= ((#{page} - 1) * #{limit} + 1) and rnum <= (#{page} * #{limit}) order by EN_NUM desc
